allow: Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "SELECT name, email, mobile_number FROM stock_analytics.users LIMIT 3;")
WebFetch(domain:themewagon.com)
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "SELECT id, name, email FROM stock_analytics.users WHERE email = ''acndigitalenterprise@gmail.com'';")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "SELECT id, full_name, email FROM stock_analytics.requests WHERE email = ''acndigitalenterprise@gmail.com'';")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "UPDATE stock_analytics.users SET email_verified_at = NOW() WHERE email = ''acndigitalenterprise@gmail.com''; SELECT id, name, email, email_verified_at FROM stock_analytics.users WHERE email = ''acndigitalenterprise@gmail.com'';")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "SELECT id, name, email, email_verified_at, remember_token FROM stock_analytics.users WHERE id = 21;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "INSERT INTO stock_analytics.users (name, email, password, role, email_verified_at, remember_token) VALUES (''Test User'', ''test@example.com'', ''$2y$10$examplehash'', ''user'', NULL, ''test-token-123''); SELECT id, name, email, remember_token FROM stock_analytics.users WHERE email = ''test@example.com'';")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "INSERT INTO stock_analytics.users (name, email, password, role, email_verified_at, remember_token) VALUES (''Test Bug Fix'', ''testbugfix@example.com'', ''$2y$10$examplehash'', ''user'', NULL, ''token-bug-fix-test-123456789012345678901234567890''); SELECT id, name, email, email_verified_at, LEFT(remember_token, 20) as token_preview FROM stock_analytics.users WHERE email = ''testbugfix@example.com'';")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "DELETE FROM stock_analytics.users WHERE email = ''testbugfix@example.com'';")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "SELECT id, name, email, role, email_verified_at FROM stock_analytics.users WHERE email = ''coretechlead@gmail.com'';")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "UPDATE stock_analytics.users SET email_verified_at = NOW() WHERE email = ''coretechlead@gmail.com''; SELECT id, name, email, role, email_verified_at FROM stock_analytics.users WHERE email = ''coretechlead@gmail.com'';")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "ALTER TABLE stock_analytics.requests MODIFY COLUMN mobile_number VARCHAR(255) NULL;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "SELECT id, name, email, role FROM stock_analytics.users WHERE role IN (''admin'', ''super_admin'');")
Bash(notepad:*)
Bash(ping:*)

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "DELETE FROM stock_analytics.sessions WHERE last_activity < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR);")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM stock_analytics.sessions;")
